data.description: Putin signed a decree on social guarantees for developers and operators of robotic systems and electronic warfare in Donbass and Novorossiya and their families.

data.title: Xole AI introduces AI-powered platform for creating hyper-realistic spooky videos and images for Halloween in seconds, no design skills needed.
data.description: An innovative platform has been introduced that allows people to generate incredibly lifelike spooky videos and images instantly, without the need for any design expertise. This development comes in time for Halloween, with content creators and brands increasingly utilizing artificial intelligence to enhance their seasonal narratives. The platform's launch in London on October 31, 2025, has garnered attention as it empowers users to create haunting visuals with ease. This advancement reflects the growing trend of leveraging technology for creative pursuits, making it accessible to a broader audience.

data.title: Class Intercom acquires MindMixer to add survey & engagement features soon; leading social media management solution for schools.
data.description: In Lincoln, Nebraska on October 31st, 2025, Class Intercom, a prominent social media management tool for schools and school districts, revealed plans to introduce innovative survey and engagement features to its platform. This update follows recent developments within the company and aims to enhance the user experience.

data.title: Malibu Boats' Wakesetter 23 LSV wins 2025 Wakesurf and Wakeboard Boat of the Year, sixth consecutive win.
data.description: The Wakesetter 23 LSV, produced by Malibu Boats, has been named the Wakesurf and Wakeboard Boat of the Year for 2025. This recognition marks the sixth consecutive win for the model, highlighting its consistent innovation and exceptional performance in the industry.
EU's Trade Chief Sefcovic: I don't see Nexperia as a bilateral Netherlands-China issue.

data.title: Ygrene Energy Fund's Operations Team wins OnCon Icon Top 50 Operations Team Award for finance services excellence.
data.description: In Miami on October 31, 2025, the Operations Team at Ygrene Energy Fund received the prestigious OnCon Icon Top 50 Operations Team Award for their exceptional performance in financial services. The OnCon Icon Awards honor the remarkable accomplishments of leading organizations in various industries.

data.title: Nootropics Depot in Tempe, Arizona, is transforming the supplement industry with groundbreaking R&D efforts.
data.description: In Tempe, Arizona on October 31, 2025, Nootropics Depot is revolutionizing the dietary supplement industry with its rigorous research and development efforts. The company is utilizing cutting-edge laboratory technology and transparent processes to redefine the sector.

data.title: New heat shield technology by Hanbat National University researchers enhances aerospace manufacturing with dual-layer protection for high-temperature alloys, potentially revolutionizing engine longevity. Located in CHUNGCHEONG PROVINCE, Korea, report is dated Oct. 31, 2025.
data.description: In the CHUNGCHEONG PROVINCE of Korea, on October 31, 2025, a new technology was introduced that could revolutionize high-temperature alloy performance in aviation. The innovative B–Si coating technology offers dual-layer protection for aerospace components. This advancement has the potential to significantly enhance the performance and durability of high-temperature alloys used in aviation. The aerospace industry, which has seen remarkable advancements over the past century, may benefit greatly from this breakthrough technology.

data.title: 73% of legal clients find attorneys online, but highly qualified lawyers suffer visibility issues, losing millions in business.
data.description: A recent study conducted in New York reported a significant disparity in how legal clients are being acquired. According to the research, a staggering 73% of legal clients are now discovering their lawyers through online platforms. However, despite this trend, a large number of highly skilled attorneys are not being prominently featured in these searches. This oversight is causing them to lose out on potential business opportunities to lesser experienced competitors.

data.title: Investors pleased as Amazon's AI investments pay off, boosting stock rally.
data.description: Investors expressed enthusiasm over the recent performance of a leading technology company, as its significant investments in artificial intelligence are now starting to yield positive results. The latest results showcased a successful increase in profitability and efficiency, reflecting the impact of the company's focus on AI technologies. This development has sparked optimism among investors, driving up the company's stock price by a notable percentage.

data.title: Yonsei University creates high-voltage solid-state batteries with groundbreaking fluoride-based electrolyte, surpassing voltage limits.
data.description: A revolutionary solid electrolyte based on fluoride has been created by researchers in Seoul, South Korea, marking a significant breakthrough in battery technology. The electrolyte has surpassed traditional voltage limits, paving the way for enhanced performance in next-generation batteries. The development comes from Yonsei University and was announced on October 31, 2025. This innovation is set to transform the battery landscape with its advanced capabilities and has the potential to significantly impact various industries.

data.title: BVP developing 2 films by Laurice E. Molinari and 1 by Robert Homer Mollohan, blending Hollywood with Web3.
data.description: On October 31, 2025, in Los Angeles, BVP (Big Vision Pictures) revealed plans for the production of two new feature films by Laurice E. Molinari. This next-generation film and television studio is known for combining Hollywood storytelling with Web3 innovation. The upcoming projects include a boxing-driven drama, showcasing the studio's commitment to blending traditional and modern entertainment elements. This announcement signifies BVP's dedication to exploring new avenues in film production.

data.title: Jimmy's Jazz & Blues Club in Portsmouth, NH will host a month of performances in November including Grammy-winning artists and local talents.
data.description: In Portsmouth, New Hampshire, Jimmy's Jazz & Blues Club is gearing up for an exciting November lineup of performances as temperatures cool down. Throughout the month, the club will host a variety of acts including Grammy-winning artists, soulful singers, acclaimed jazz groups, and beloved local talents. The diverse schedule promises something for everyone, with each night offering unique and unforgettable entertainment. This month-long event is set to showcase the talents of a range of musicians, making it a must-visit destination for music lovers.

data.title: Prenetics buys 100 Bitcoin, IM8 achieves $100M in ARR through strategic acquisition.
data.description: In a recent report, it was revealed that the global economy is projected to grow by 4.5% in 2021, a significant increase from the 3.5% decline experienced in 2020 due to the pandemic. The economic recovery is expected to vary across regions, with emerging markets and developing economies forecasted to grow by 6.3% in 2021. Advanced economies, on the other hand, are expected to grow by 5.6% this year. However, these positive trends come with a warning of uncertainties, such as uneven vaccine distribution and potential new COVID-19 variants, which could derail the economic recovery. Overall, while the global economy is showing signs of improvement, challenges still persist.

data.title: Allspring funds announced monthly distributions - EAD, ERC, and ERH on NYSE American, Oct. 31, 2025.
data.description: Charlotte, North Carolina, on October 31, 2025 - The Allspring Income Opportunities Fund (EAD), Allspring Multi-Sector Income Fund (ERC), and Allspring Utilities and High Income Fund (ERH) disclosed distributions. Each of the funds, listed on the NYSE American, are set to distribute income.

data.title: Global Water Resources (NASDAQ: GWRS) declares monthly cash dividend of $0.02533 per common share ($0.30396 annual).
data.description: In Phoenix on October 31, 2025, Global Water Resources, Inc. (NASDAQ: GWRS), a company specializing in water resource management, announced a new monthly cash dividend of $0.02533 per common share. This figure translates to an annual dividend rate of $0.30396 per share under the company's dividend policy.

data.title: Everus Construction Group to participate in three investor conferences: Baird 2025 Global Industrial Conference on Nov. 11, Oppenheimer Winter Industrial Summit on Dec. 10, and Goldman Sachs Energy, CleanTech & Utilities Conference 2026 on Jan. 6. President and CEO Jeffrey S. Thiede and CFO Maximillian J Marcy will represent.
data.description: BISMARCK, North Dakota - Everus Construction Group revealed today that President and CEO Jeffrey S. Thiede and Chief Financial Officer Maximillian J Marcy will be attending several upcoming investor conferences. These include the Baird 2025 Global Industrial Conference on November 11 at The Ritz-Carlton Chicago, the Oppenheimer Winter Industrial Summit on December 10 held virtually, and the Goldman Sachs Energy, CleanTech & Utilities Conference 2026 on January 6 at JW Marriott Miami Turnberry Resort.
